name: 莊欣慈
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的犲發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Week(s)　　Academic Connections 3
1       　　Orientation
2       　　Unit 1 – Biology: Brains and Gender [Reading]
3       　　Unit 1 – [Reading] / [Listening]
4        　　Unit 1 – [Writing]
5        　　Unit 2 – Business: Pricing [Reading]
6        　　Unit 2 – [Reading] / [Listening]
7       　　Unit 2 – [Writing]
8       　　Review / Presentations
9       　　Midterm Examination
10      　　Unit 3 – Social Psychology: Conformity [Reading]
11      　　Unit 3 – [Reading] / [Listening]
12     　　Unit 3 – [Writing]
13     　　Unit 4 – Architecture: Aesthetics [Reading]
14      　　Unit 4 – [Reading] / [Listening]
15      　　Unit 4 – [Writing]
16 - 17　　Oral Presentations
18     　　Final Examination
scorePolicy:
課堂表現 (如:上課活動、小組討論、筆記寫作、報告表現等) 50%
回家作業 (如:作文寫作、閱讀預習、小組共同作業等) 20%
期中全校英文會考成績 15%
期末全校英文會考成績 15%
materials: Academic Connections 3. Julia Williams and David Hill. (2010) (Pearson Education)
